TopicTitle: Lander stopped functioning all together! Why!

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I recently landed an unmanned lander on Mun and now that I wanted to start sending scientific results back to Kerbin I realized that absolutely nothing on my lander is working. The lander is equipped with a battery and solar panels and by now on the sunny side of Mun. I did though land it on the dark side and then accelerated time until it was on the sunny side, so I had the electricity to work the sensors and antenna. I tried everything and googled for ages. Not a single function on my lander is available. The blue buttons in the context menus have all disappeared.

I have no mods installed.

I really hope someone here can help me as this is becoming quite frustrating. Please tell me, if you need more information. Thanks a lot in advance.
you're probably still timewarping. double check you're in 1x speed
I think that was it. Thanks a lot. I must have been blind.
